short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically downloads recent DailyFaithPromiseCashReceipt.xls files from the AGUSM Missions Portal.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DonorImport is a service that syncs AG donation files to your support-raising software. The DonorImport Extension operates in the background to automatically download recent Daily Cash Receipt.xls files from the AGUSM Missions Portal.

NOTE: Please install this extension into a separate Chrome profile with a custom Downloads folder that points to your DonorImport dropbox.
